                                                exception.TableException
        Make a select query, return the result set and export the table into a file
        Parameters:
        query - The atring of the query
        dbType - Mysql or Postgres
        server -
        port -
        database -
        user -
        password -
        countFirst - If true count also the number of row of the result query
        targetTable - The table to modify
        filePath - Absolute file path of the export
        separator - Filed separator in the exported file
        delimiter - Filed delimiter in the exported file
        exportFormat - 1 = txt, 2 = csv
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
